sentences: He was born on July 16, 1905 in Napajedla (today's Czech Republic).
He was an older brother of the famous pianist Rudolf Firkušný, and their sister Marie Kasiková (born Firkušná, October 11, 1909).
He was one of the founders of the music festival Prague Spring.
He died on July 9, 1950 in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
